import React from 'react'; import './ViewBookingDetail.css'; function ViewBookingDetail({ booking, onClose }) { const handleConfirmBooking = () => { // Handle confirm booking logic console.log(`Confirm booking with ID: ${booking.id}`); }; const handleCancelBooking = () => { // Handle cancel booking logic console.log(`Cancel booking with ID: ${booking.id}`); }; return (

Booking Details

Name: {booking.name}
Treatment Date: {booking.treatmentDate}
Treatment Type: {booking.treatmentType}
Time: {booking.time}
Description: {booking.description}
Status: {booking.status}
Doctor: {booking.doctorName}
); } export default ViewBookingDetail;
